summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, University View Addition, being the alley between 34th Avenue Northeast and 35th Avenue Northeast, from East 57th Street to East 60th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 13896 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
